scope.title: Footer
scope.description: Footers help users find what they need after scrolling to the bottom of a page. They provide supplementary information such as copyright, ABN details, contact information, links to other pages within the website, and email and social media links.

data.title: Footer
data.description: Footers help users find what they need after scrolling to the bottom of a page. They provide supplementary information such as copyright, ABN details, contact information, links to other pages within the website, and email and social media links.
